title: Rachel Reeves says Gatwick second runway shows government is ‘backing builders, not blockers’ – business live
summary: Green Party's Zack Polanski criticized the decision to approve a second runway at Gatwick Airport, calling it "a disaster." The news has sparked ongoing discussions regarding economic impacts and environmental concerns. This reflects broader debates about infrastructure expansion versus sustainability.

title: Trump tells Kirk memorial he hates opponents; Optus to face ‘significant consequences’ over outage; and a shark threesome
summary: During a memorial event in Arizona, the president addressed the crowd shortly after the widow of a rightwing influencer, who was fatally shot, expressed her forgiveness toward the accused shooter. The widow's statement of forgiveness drew attention in the context of the tragedy. The event underscored themes of loss, healing, and the complexities surrounding violence and forgiveness.

title: If Anyone Builds it, Everyone Dies review – how AI could kill us all
summary: Eliezer Yudkowsky and Nate Soares warn that the emergence of superintelligent machines could pose an existential threat to humanity. They argue that if such machines surpass human intelligence, the consequences could be dire. This raises the question of whether their concerns should be taken seriously by society.
